strings.item: While updating the config file an error has occurred!
The config file has been successfully updated!

The connection to the database failed. Details below:
%s
To start the database update, please click on the button below.
While updating the database an error has occurred!
The database has been successfully updated. You may now return to your website, but please follow the instructions below.
The most recent version is already installed!
The database has been successfully updated!
Despite careful contentwise control we do not take over adhesion for contents of external hyperlinks. Exclusively the operators are responsible for the contents of the linked pages.

The requested module or the requested file is either missing or has not been activated.
Please contact the administrator of this site, if the error should occur repeatedly.
ATTENTION: By changing the language you will lose all form changes!

During the installation an error has occured, whereby the installation can't be continued. Please re-check all the entries, especially if all the information in the configuration file is correct.
Please click on the "Back"-button, to go back to the start of the installation process.

All queries have been successfully executed, so that the installation is now complete.
By the following button you can reach the frontend of your website. Afterwards you can log in and do further changes to your site, eg. changing the language, choosing an other design or publishing content.
Attention: Please delete the "installation"-folder, because it could be a potential security risk if this folder should exist in a production environment.

You are currently using a very old version of ACP3, therefore the database update process consists of 2 steps.
Please click "Update Database" first to adapt the database to the new module structure, and then click "Forward" so that the modules will ultimately be updated.

It looks like that the installation of the ACP3 4.0 was successful.
This is just a test news, you can now edit or delete in the administration area.
Because of short-term maintenance work this website is temporarily unavailable. Please try again in a few minutes.
see date function of PHP.
In detail, the installer will guide you through the following steps:
Verifying the server configuration, if all requirements imposed by the ACP3 4.0 are met.
Entering the basic parameters of the website.
Welcome to the installation of ACP3 4.0. This installation wizard will help you to install the ACP3 4.0 and getting it initially configured.
These requirements have to be fulfilled, otherwise you can't successfully install the ACP3. Furthermore, it is checked whether there are certain files and folders writable.

Here we check the PHP settings of your webspace/server, which shouldn't be relevant to successfully install the ACP3. If one field is displayed in red, so please don't hesitatee in contacting your hosting provider to resolve this issue.
The installation can't continue because your webspace/server doesn't fulfills the necessary requirements.
Please type in a date format.
Please type in the hostname, which belongs to the database.
Please type in the database name.
Please type in the user name for the database.
Either the password is empty or in the repetition is a typo.
Please type in an user name for the administrator account.
Please set the CHMOD for the config.php, which is located in the "includes"-folder, to 777.
The E-mail address doesn't match the format "name@domain.tld".
